description: This file defines a server-side page component for a restaurant detail page in a Next.js application. It includes a static parameter generator for static site generation and a React component rendering a client-side component.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches restaurant data and generates static parameters for each restaurant ID, with fallback default IDs in case of error.

methods.name: RestaurantDetailPage
methods.description: React functional component that renders the RestaurantDetailClient component for the restaurant detail page.
